author: ate
msg: PortalURL instantiating is now done through a new PortalURLValveImpl, so that CapabilityValveImpl can determine
the correct character encoding in time.
Furthermore, AbstractPortalURL dependency on RequestContext is removed to allow easier integration of Fusion.

author: dlestrat
msg: Adding support for creating user in specified authentication provider.
Also, added comment to permission manager. Clarification.
